title: Is Justin Bieber feeling better than before? - Quora

response.answer_text: you know what? i’ve seen him in a few recent interviews and he seems to be feeling better than before - at least that is my hope for him! he got into the music industry so young and we all saw what happened to britney spears! handlers and managers and body guards and he was such a young boy and he had responsibilities and millions of fans relying on him and that is a bunch of pressure! and then contracts fulfill and all kinds of people around him telling him what to do! but yes - he seems to be doing better than before and i hope that is true! i think he is trying to grow up and be a man and that is always a good thing! i wish the best for him! and i hope this answer helps you!
now that he has found Christ, yes :) if you want joy, peace, hope, satisfaction, and forgiveness, check out this video ;)
